entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Windows test failures - `PrecompiledRegex_*` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #65978
  • Assertion failed 'schema.size() > 0' during 'Profile instrumentation' #65977
  • Segmentation fault while running "dotnet build" #65976
  • Intermittent EF Core/Azure SQL Connection Issues #65975
  • [API Proposal]: Add ObsoleteAttribute.BinaryCompatOnly #65965
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting] BackgroundService ExecuteAsync can prevent app from stopping #65964
  • [wasm] Build libclang in dotnet/llvm-project for arm arch #65961
    7.0.0
  • [DebuggerDisplay] for JsonTypeInfo does not render #65960
    7.0.0
  • [Android][x86] Build failed: Opcode r4_add/r4_conv_to_r8 missing from machine description file. #65958
  • [WASM] Wasm.Build.Tests run with `EMSDK` - `clang` failing to load `libLLVM-13git.so` #65956
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStreamReadTests.TestAsyncErrorStream_SynchronizingObject test failed #65955
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster test failed #65954
  • [FileStream] Multiple FileShare are not working in FileStream #65953
  • Locking StreamReader processes on EndOfStream #65952
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to support tar archives #65951
  • [API Proposal]: Add a fast Norm() or IsCloseTo(double tolerance) Function to `INumber<TSelf>` #65950
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\localloc\\call\\call07_small\\call07_small.cmd #65943
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StructABI\\structreturn\\structreturn.cmd #65942
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Bytemark\\Bytemark\\Bytemark.cmd #65940

Closed

  • Default to IsDevelopment in common development scenarios #65689
    Future
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes.cmd #65941
  • [API Proposal]: Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate() consistent with delegate* #65853
  • [WASM] Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class-accessors.c:89, condition `<disabled>' not met #65957
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync and propagation of endogenous cancellation errors #65963
  • GCStandAlone Linux arm64 - largearraytest/largearraytest.sh [FAIL] #62084
  • GCStandAlone Windows arm64 - test HeapExpansion\plug\plug.cmd [FAIL] #62083
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\suppressfinalize\\suppressfinalize.cmd #63658
  • WriteDump failed of dotnet-dump net 6 single file #65347
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd_v2/dlbigleakthd_v2.sh #63981
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\BenchmarksGame\\regex-redux\\regex-redux-5\\regex-redux-5.cmd #62174
  • [Tests] System.Text.RegularExpressions System.InvalidProgramException : Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program #65278
    7.0.0
  • Path.GetFullPath has different behavior on macOS and Linux when passed a string of whitespace #65683
    7.0.0
  • .NET Core application fails to find CA cert on Linux even after putting the certificates in ca cert store of openssl #65851
  • Why doesn't PriorityQueue have the Remove(TElement element) method #65928
  • interface like mono_domain_create_appdomain is declared but there is no implemention. #63494
    7.0.0
  • Support for tar archives #1540
    7.0.0
  • BadImageFormatException when calling both C++\CLI on .NET FW 4.8 and C++\CLI on .NET 5 from same C++ project #65604
  • Review skipped test case for regex scanner with \c[ pattern #65931
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release/6.0] Backport of Mariner 2.0 and Linux Arm64 packaging work #65979
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • [hot_reload] various post-Preview 1 fixes #65973
    area-EnC-mono
  • [TEST ONLY] trying to repro a bug #65972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DebuggerDisplay for serializer types #65971
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [mono] Remove support for nint/nuint/nfloat from mini-native-types.c #65967
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Remove pinning from number formatting in corelib #65962
    area-System.Runtime
  • Mark ImageAnimator.UpdateFrames to accept a nullable Image #65949
    area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update the StubManager for better debugger stepping. #65947
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Convert* for Vector{64, 128} on ARM64 #65946
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Merged

  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui version info to stored data. Runtime Side #65800
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview2] Remove usages of native bootstrapping #65974
  • Add regex "unit tests" test project #65944
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix minor random bias #65404
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Make Is*Project properties unambiguous and improve IsGeneratorProject detection #65896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update WASI-enabled runtime to support running ASP.NET Core #65888
    area-Build-mono
  • Update GenAPI usage and code clean-up #65887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update stale comments that reference GitHub issues #65932
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Add AssemblyName overload for ILVerify.IResolver.Resolve method #65905
    area-ILVerification
  • null-check the redirect context before using. #65910
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Native aot trim annotations experiment #65816
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not value number locals on the LHS #65902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix libraries GCStress pipeline #65924
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Keep Obsolete and EditorBrowsable attributes consistent between ref and src and DefineConst clean-up #65847
    area-Meta, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Make ObjectConverter use ConverterStrategy.Object #65748
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix GC hole with multi-reg local var stores #65916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-preview2][mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65867
    area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix cancellation race condition in PipeStream cancellation callback #65909
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Disable default marshalling for bool #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Make DllImportGenerator emit a GeneratedCodeAttribute on our stubs #65868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • add missing GC.SuppressFinalize(this) to FileStream.DisposeAsync #65899
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use generic `Enum` methods when possible. #64850
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • retire DummyTcpServer from SslStream tests #65876
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65842
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pasting into a raw string literal should ensure things stay parseable. #59820
  • Typing in Razor files breaks C# incrementality resulting in high CPU & memory usage #59818
  • Add missing namespace for 'Deconstruct' methods #59817
  • Stack Trace Explorer does not work on Maui code in VS 2022 17.1 Preview 3 #59815
  • Nullability flow analysis does not work with logical OR/AND boolean operators. #59812
  • Extraneous padding is not removed when formatting string interpolations #59811
  • Cannot run tests in codespaces #59807

Closed

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UseCollectionInitializer.VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer #59819
  • Source Generator AnalyzerConfigOptions delete all Property text after the first newline or semicolon #59761
  • Source Generators: Intellisense is sluggish #58008
    17.1
  • MetadataAsSource: should record types be displayed as records? #44566
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify our test artifacts directory to upload more stuff on failure #59822
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove inaccurate section of doc comment #59821
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust checklist for merging new compiler feature #59816
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59814
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't get nullable slot if property sub-pattern has error #59813
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Suppress formatting with stackalloc array creations #59808
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Disallow converted string as default argument value #59806
    Area-Compilers, 17.2

Merged

  • Add GlobalOptions.SetBackgroundAnalysisScope and PythiaGlobalOptions External Access API #59794
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Add MetadataAsSource test for records #59736
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community, 17.2.P2
  • Do not retry on Clipboard API for StackTraceExplorer #59658
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.2.P2

Updated

  • Update config for snap #59824
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merges/main to release/dev17.2 #59823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records
  • View call hierarchy fix (#57856) #59739
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change navigation helpers to operate in two steps. #59798
    Area-IDE
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • Update go-to-def handler to support entirely async go-to-def operation. #59801
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE
  • Review feedback from #59510 #59600
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Removed navigation target and navigation hint from namespaces #59793
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix IDE0051 not working when using nameof() (#54972) #59803
    Area-Analyzers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server router avoid instantiating MainLayout twice #40455
  • Blazor Server - Circuits instantiate slower and slower in Firefox (up to 60 seconds) #40453
  • Add a middleware to enforce request size limits #40452
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Allow using BindProperty when using FromBody or ApiController attributes #40449
  • `UseWindowsService` does not work with `WebApplicationBuilder` #40445
    7.0-preview4

Closed

  • Identity: email confirmation codes are case sensitive #40285
  • Reconnect modal displays immediately in Firefox upon navigation #40414
  • Firefox temporarily shows reconnect dialog while navigating to new page #40425
  • Jquery menu navigation is not working at the initial load in Blazor server #40429
  • ReUse installed .NET runtime #40431
  • Json Serialization for DateTime fields in Blazor JS Interop #40440
  • Log format in net6.0 has changed and broken k8s log output #40448
  • Bug 1487866: [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.3.22118.7] blazorboilerplate "Todo list" page load with System.InvalidOperationException #40368
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Build .rpm's for Mariner 2 #40456
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Identity Model to 6.15.1 #40451
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.7 to 1.5.10 in /src/Components/Web.JS #40441
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Merged

  • Speed up contended HTTP/2 frame writing #40407
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.7 to 1.5.10 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #40442
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.7 to 1.5.10 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/signalr-protocol-msgpack #40443
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix ResourceManagerStringLocalizerFactory caching #33129
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.7 to 1.5.10 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/signalr #40444
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • !nits! Cleanup three projects #40422
    7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Fix incorrect h2 header decoding. #40412
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • [WIP] Update installer/tests for ARM64 #39523
    area-runtime
  • New TryParseModelBinder #40233
    area-mvc
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable trimming for Http.Abstractions #40430
    area-runtime
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shadow markup extension error #4974
  • Build fails when Powershell fails to load libpsl on M1 mac #4972
  • ResourceDictionary does not allow removing or modifying styles with classes, i.e. not hot reload friendly #4969
  • Shell Navgitation to Modal Page loads page over app boundaries in Android #4961
  • Proposal for new API to create Behaviors #4958

Closed

  • VS 2022 17.2.0 preview 1 - Cant compile project because of MAUI:GridLayout #4966
  • Unexpected end of stream on com.android.okhttp.Address@537f9da6 #4836
  • [Bug] The Windows ImageDirectory property is weird and not very user-friendly #886
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • .net MAUI on WEB #4941
    Future
  • Not possible to include a RazorClassLibrary in a .NET Maui App targetting Android #4898
  • StartTimer - remove #3950
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting macOS from Windows #4923
  • Location Allow Once vs Always #4790
  • Android and iOS devices not available debug window after installing Preview 13 (VS 2022 17.2.0 P1) #4932
  • Visual Studio 2022 preview dot net maui preview 13 #4894
  • [Bug] CollectionView not working #2929
  • QR and Barcode Scanning #4960
  • [Android emulator] MAUI Blazor essentials camera exception #4597
  • [Bug] Frame CornerRadius Not working properly when Margin is setup to minus value (push to top) #4656
  • [Bug] [Android] Modal content not resizing #3494
  • VS 17.1 prv2: default maui builds and deploys Windows but fails to build Android with error shown #4593
  • [Windows] The shadow doesn't shows when using the GraphicsView #3762
  • [Bug] AppActions and other gestures trigger multiple windows or instances to display #3199
  • HarmonyOS support #2405
    Future
  • [Bug] Button VisualState doesn't reset after Pressed #4930

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Application.Properties implementation #4976
  • Update Development Guide dotnet sources #4975
  • Update powershell version #4973
  • Add Emscripten back to rollback file #4971
  • Fix up tests after Shell runs #4970
  • Map Controls.Picker.TextTransform #4967
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker

Merged

  • [Android] Update the DatePicker Dialog if the display info changes #4815
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in ScrollView IsEnabled property #4881
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Move TabbedPageHandler to TabbedViewHandler #4893
  • [Android] Clear focus and hide keyboard submitting the text or disabling the View #4828
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Use bash to install dotnet rather than sh #4916
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove `IPlatformServices.RequestedTheme` and use Essentials #4964
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Remove IImageSourceServiceConfiguration #4954
    area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Update PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md #4965
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add more APIs to IDispatcher #4944
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/animation 🎬, p/0, Cost:M, Status:InProgress, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [X] remove generation of __InitComponentRuntime #4911

Updated

  • Windows FlowDirection #4936
    area/a11y, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [WIP] Enable Window Sizing #4942
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Update WebAuthenticator sample package versions #4945
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporal table for InMemory or SQLite #27522
  • EF Core 6 , on model builder configuration doesn't have (Map) Method #27517
  • EF core 6 returns null value for owned entity #27516

Closed

  • Migration Not recognized on machines or directories that didn't create the migration. #27521
  • How to customize IMemoryCache service options #27458
  • How to instantiate value object using one db column #27505
  • EFCore how to dynamic specific table name #27434

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerBytes from 2.0.0 to 2.1.0 #27518
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [release/7.0-preview2] Fix merge conflict markers in 7.0-preview2 #27519

Updated

  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.7 to 8.0.8 #27488
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Humanizer.Core from 2.13.14 to 2.14.1 #27321
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions where possible #27500
  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27423 - Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27452
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add source-build nowarn for NU1603 #13289
  • Fix bug in smoke-test prereq gathering logic #13288

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13287

Updated

  • Rewrite smoke-tests.sh in new test framework based smoke tests #13286
